title: Extended Trade Deadline & TNF Preview!
itunes:title: Extended Trade Deadline & TNF Preview!
description:
In a room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling – react to news of Washington signing LB Reuben Foster following his recent off-field issues (4:40), Jacksonville benching Blake Bortles (9:00) and Andy Dalton hits IR (13:55). After, the heroes break out their ‘Extended Trade Deadline’ deals (23:40), including – Odell catching TDs from Luck (24:20), Loose Cannon’s unrequited love, Danny Playoff, moves back to NE (31:00)! Lastly, Dak, Zeke and Cooper battle NOLA on TNF (47:40)!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
